channel.title: Username Help (PI)
channel.description: [size=2]Hello. I need help with a problem.[/size] [size=2]How to i stop players creating usernames with Mod or Admin in it? Example: Mod Paul, Admin Paul[/size] [size=2]I'd be really grateful for any help :D. [/size]
